title: 服务器无法进去！
author: LittleWen
txt_content:
26.07 10:24:39 [服务器] 警告 Entity is at -Infinity,Infinity (chunk 2147483647,2147483647) but was stored in chunk -7,526.07 10:24:39 [服务器] 警告 Wrong location for EntityPhantomSwordBase['entity.flammpfeil.slashblade.PhantomSwordBase.name'/499, l='plotworld', x=-Infinity, y=-Infinity, z=Infinity] in world 'plotworld'!
这个是错误报告

replies.author: cc7w
replies.txt_content:
尝试把服务器config/Forge.cfg
两个remove打头的项改true

replies.author: Lenovo_B49
replies.txt_content: 估计是地皮插件的问题,建议楼主先把所有插件都卸载掉，然后一个个的安装就可以排除问题了

replies.author: xinyang0326
replies.txt_content: 这个我可以帮你解决掉，而且蛮简单的！区块问题！需要的话回我一下
